item.description: 2020-11-18 - Tiger Meeting Notes Paolo been working on testing. He has TIGER/toolchain/gcc-test-scan, inside he has folders with errors for practicality.

item.title: 2021-01-13 - Tiger Optimisation (memset/memcpy)
item.description: 2021-01-13 - Tiger Optimisation (memset/memcpy) Optimising expansion of memcpy/memset using hardware loops Currently memcpy and memset get expanded to a list of stores and loads for small sized values.
